# bis620.2022

  [![test-coverage](https://github.com/Juli66/bis620.2022/actions/workflows/test-coverage.yaml/badge.svg?branch=main)](https://github.com/Juli66/bis620.2022/actions/workflows/test-coverage.yaml)

The goal of bis620.2022 is to visualize time seire dataset
And also including a functionality of spectral signature plot.
The dataset ukb_accel included is from UKBiobank.

## Test Coverage

url:
  "https://app.codecov.io/github/Juli66/bis620.2022/commit/d61fa729c212daac532c977e06ae9f12ec8d39f7"

## Installation

You can install the development version of bis620.2022 from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with: <br>
`install.packages("devtools")` <br>
`devtools::install_github("juli66/bis620.2022")`

## Example

```{r example}
library(bis620.2022)
data(ukb_accel)
ukb_accel[1:100, ] |>
  accel_plot()
```
